Package controllers

Class HomeController

  • java.lang.Object
    • play.mvc.Results
      • play.mvc.Controller
        • controllers.HomeController
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    play.mvc.Http.HeaderNames, play.mvc.Http.Status
    public class HomeController
extends play.mvc.Controller
    HomeController is the Controller that handles the HTTP requests for searching for information on given search query, for fetching the freelancer project data, for fetching user data.
    Author:
    Group part

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      java.util.concurrent.CompletionStage<play.mvc.Result> getEmployer​(java.lang.String query)
      This method searches and displays the projects from the user query and renders the specific employer data in HTML.
      java.util.concurrent.CompletionStage<play.mvc.Result> getGlobalStat()
      This method displays the word statistics for all the project which are displayed based on the projects preview descriptions.
      java.util.concurrent.CompletionStage<play.mvc.Result> getIndividualStat​(java.lang.String project_id, java.lang.String project_title, java.lang.String project_descr)
      This method displays the word statistics for a particular project based on the project's preview description.
      java.util.concurrent.CompletionStage<play.mvc.Result> getSearchResults​(java.lang.String query)
      This method takes the search term/query from the url, fetches the data from the api call and renders the data in HTML.
      java.util.concurrent.CompletionStage<play.mvc.Result> getSkillsResult​(java.lang.String skill_key)
      This method fetches all the projects related to the given skill.
      java.util.concurrent.CompletionStage<play.mvc.Result> index​(java.lang.String query)
      This method takes the search term/query, fetches the data from the api call and renders the data in HTML.

        public java.util.concurrent.CompletionStage<play.mvc.Result> getSkillsResult​(java.lang.String skill_key)
        This method fetches all the projects related to the given skill. It uses the Skill ID to get the data from the API call. The result is displayed in HTML.
        Parameters:
